entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 9:20 PM CST Saturday 04 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 9:20 PM CST Saturday 04 March 2023
